mediator

Class Incident

  • java.lang.Object
    • mediator.Incident

  • public class Incident
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of an obstacle in a specific geographic location

    • Constructor Detail

      • Incident

        public Incident(int latitude,
                int longitude,
                java.lang.String info,
                Vehicle origin)
        The constructor of the Incident class
        Parameters:
        latitude - The geographic north-south location of the incident
        longitude - The geographic east-west location of the incident
        info - A string containing human-readable information about an Incident (Obstacle)
        origin - The vehicle which detected the Incident

    • Method Detail

        public void setCustomerInfo(java.lang.String info)
        A setter for the human-readable info text
        Parameters:
        info - A string of letters containing information about the obstacle
